name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easyfill: Text Expander and Snippet Manager

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly insert saved text snippets anywhere on the web, reducing the need for repetitive typing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easyfill: Supercharge Your Typing with Smart Text Expansion

Easyfill is the ultimate text expansion tool that saves you time and eliminates repetitive typing. With over a million keystrokes saved, it's the perfect companion for professionals, students, and anyone looking to boost their productivity.

== Key Features ==

âœ“ Snippet Management - Create, edit, and delete text snippets effortlessly
âœ“ Category Organization - Keep your snippets neatly organized for quick access
âœ“ Lightning-Fast Expansion - Use customizable trigger symbols to instantly expand your text
âœ“ Powerful Search - Find any snippet in seconds with our built-in search feature
âœ“ Import/Export Functionality - Easily backup and restore your snippets and categories
âœ“ Auto-detect Mode - Let Easyfill automatically recognize your snippet triggers
âœ“ Customizable Trigger Symbol - Set your preferred symbol for snippet expansion
âœ“ Dynamic Date and Time - Insert current date and time using {date} and {time} variables

Easyfill works seamlessly across all websites, making it the perfect tool for:

ğŸ“§ Email Composition - Insert common phrases, signatures, or entire email templates
ğŸ“ Content Creation - Quickly add frequently used text blocks or formatting
ğŸ’¼ Customer Support - Respond faster with pre-written answers to common questions
ğŸ“ Academic Writing - Insert citations, formulas, or standard paragraphs with ease
ğŸ’» Programming - Expand code snippets or documentation comments instantly

== Why Choose Easyfill? ==

â˜… User-Friendly Interface: Get started in minutes with our intuitive design
â˜… Works Anywhere: Use Easyfill in any text field across the web
â˜… Boost Productivity: Save hours each week by eliminating repetitive typing
â˜… Reduce Errors: Ensure consistency and accuracy in your communications
â˜… Customizable: Tailor Easyfill to your specific needs with flexible options

== Privacy and Security ==

Your privacy is our top priority. Easyfill operates locally on your device and does not collect or transmit any of your personal data or snippet content. Easyfill needs the permission to "access data on all websites" to work on all the text fields/inputs in any website.

== Get Started with Easyfill ==

Transform your typing experience today! Install Easyfill and start saving time with every keystroke. Whether you're a busy professional, a student, or anyone who types regularly, Easyfill is your key to enhanced productivity.

For questions, support, or feedback, please contact us at easyfillapp@gmail.com.

Visit our website for more information and documentation: https://easy-fill.vercel.app/

Follow our updates on twitter: https://x.com/easyfillapp
